Welcome to the *Tar Devils Sociology Symposium* webpage!

The second Tar Devils Sociology Symposium will be held January 31, 2026, at UNC Chapel Hill. It will bring together the graduate student researchers at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and Duke University.

**Important Note**: We are closely monitoring the weather for Saturday. As of now, the conference will continue as planned. Any changes will be communicated by confetence organizers no later than Friday at 5pm.
